format: Makefile inclusion script with shell functions
description: This file is an include file for build recipes related to cross-compiling Rust for a specific target architecture, defining variables, build, and install functions for the cross-compiler package.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Builds the Rust stage 2 compiler using the rust_runx command.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the compiled Rust libraries and tools, adjusts library paths, sets environment variables, and copies source and lib files necessary for cross-compilation.
